LanguageData.Astoriel_Crafter.title: Artisan
LanguageData.Astoriel_Crafter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has an innate ability to find and restore tech. [PAWN_pronoun] is resourceful in a fight.
LanguageData.Astoriel_Scientist.title: Star watcher
LanguageData.Astoriel_Scientist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a researcher of the stars of the Astoriel Septarchy. [PAWN_pronoun] knows [PAWN_pronoun] way around a lab.
LanguageData.Astoriel_XenoZoo.title: Rancher
LanguageData.Astoriel_XenoZoo.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] operates a ranch for non-sentient life within the Astoriel Septarchy and is very fond of animals.
LanguageData.Astoriel_Colinizer.title: Scout
LanguageData.Astoriel_Colinizer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is part of the effort to explore for the Astoriel Septarchy.
LanguageData.Astoriel_Doctor.title: Healer
LanguageData.Astoriel_Doctor.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a practitioner of the healing arts.
LanguageData.Astoriel_Soldier.title: Sheikah
LanguageData.Astoriel_Soldier.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the standard shock troop for the Astoriel Septarchy.
LanguageData.Astoriel_Ambassador.title: Dancer
LanguageData.Astoriel_Ambassador.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] dances in Astoriel cities. [PAWN_pronoun] has been trained in the ways of entertaining many forms of clientele.
LanguageData.Astoriel_Officer.title: Golden knight
LanguageData.Astoriel_Officer.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] leads a squad of knights in combat.
LanguageData.Astoriel_Nurse.title: Alchemist
LanguageData.Astoriel_NavyCook.title: Septarchy cook
LanguageData.Astoriel_NavyCook.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] serves as a chef in the Astoriel Septarchy. [PAWN_pronoun] Knows [PAWN_pronoun] way around a kitchen.
LanguageData.Astoriel_Shellshocked.title: Survivor
LanguageData.Astoriel_Shellshocked.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] served in the Astoriel Septarchy. After serving on an invasion force against a rival army, [PAWN_pronoun] was the only survivor in their squad in a failed invasion attempt. [PAWN_pronoun] has refused to attack others from then on.
LanguageData.Astoriel_Hydro.title: Farmer
LanguageData.Astoriel_Hydro.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] specializes in setting up growhouses and farming.
LanguageData.Astoriel_Slasher.title: Knight
LanguageData.Astoriel_Slasher.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is used to keeping peace in the streets of the Astoriel Septarchy, typically in close quarters combat.
LanguageData.Astoriel_GeneWarrior.title: Hero
LanguageData.Astoriel_GeneWarrior.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a born leader in the Astoriel Knighthood.
LanguageData.Astoriel_CapitalChild.title: Diplomat
LanguageData.Astoriel_CapitalChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] learned at a young age how to talk [PAWN_pronoun] way out of trouble.
LanguageData.Astoriel_GeneChild.title: Adventurer
LanguageData.Astoriel_GeneChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] learned at a young age how to find creative ways around issues.
LanguageData.Astoriel_SpacerChild.title: Tinkerer
LanguageData.Astoriel_SpacerChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had a distinct ability to build for one so young, [PAWN_pronoun] also learned to coordinate with others in building projects.
LanguageData.Astoriel_ColonyChild.title: Runaway
LanguageData.Astoriel_ColonyChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on the streets of Astoriel cities. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the ropes of growing, talking, and building.
